price: Oya! Mu by’ukuri igitabo cy’inkozi z’ibibi (cyanditsemo ibikorwa byazo) gishyinguwe mu bubiko bwabugenewe bwitwa Sijiini.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
